post:
Hi guys,

we finally launched our location in The Netherlands yesterday. We will have some stock available for our 12 EUR / year deals there. We're also still offering the same deal in our Frankfurt, Germany and London, UK locations.

Please note that the new location doesn't come with any Anti DDoS protection. So if you need that, please choose our Frankfurt or London locations. The datacenter we use in The Netherlands is the DataOne in Wormer, which is only around 25km away from Amsterdam.

Our new control panel is not yet launched but it will follow within the next weeks, we are currently redeveloping some parts of it. It's coming – just a little delayed.

**[Special Plan](https://cloud.nodion.com/machines/new?code=5RAFVAVPTJ&plan_id=72)**  
- 2 vCPU Cores  
- 512 MB ECC RAM  
- 15 GB Pure SSD Storage  
- 500 GB Traffic / month @ 1 Gbps port  
- 12 EUR per year  
- Frankfurt, London or Amsterdam  
**[ORDER NOW >](https://cloud.nodion.com/machines/new?code=5RAFVAVPTJ&plan_id=72)**

Pricing in EUR. Excludes any applicable tax. Additional traffic is charged at 0,02 EUR / GB.

Ignore the "page not found" message on the checkout page and please make sure to select the yearly plan.

Custom deals are also possible, for example if you need 1 GB RAM instead of 512 MB we can do it for 20 EUR / year, etc etc. - simply contact us to get an offer and a URL to order.

**Locations**  
- Frankfurt, Germany  
- London, UK  
- Amsterdam, NL  
- Los Angeles, CA (Q2/2017)  
- Washington D.C. (Q3/2017)  
- Miami, FL (Q4/2017)

**Features coming soon**  
- Hourly Billing  
- Additional IPv4 and IPv6 support  
- DNS and rDNS self-manageable


**Chat with us:**  
https://www.nodion.com/en/ (bottom right corner)

**Email us:**  
hi@nodion.com

**Looking Glass:**  
FRA1: http://lg.fra1.nodion.com  
LON1: http://lg.lon1.nodion.com  
AMS1: coming soon, will edit (test ip: 185.182.63.60)

Cheers,  
Nik
